Lines.Speech: [i]With the advanced filter warmed up ready to go, you move forward to retrieve Kt-7 from the deadly fungi. Spores race up to the air filter as you bend over and scoop her up. Thankfully, _the spores stop at the filter.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Now, lets patch her up before moving on.
[i]It takes a while, but applying a mixture of Chemicals AZ-707 and RuF 02 rapidly heals a few skin wounds and brings her back to consciousness.

Lines.Speaker: Kt-7
Lines.Speech: Ugh... where am I? _Oh Agent Scully! It appears I failed the mission given to me. I have no excuse.
[i]Upon seeing you, Kt-7 quickly rises to her feet, performs a perfect salute and holds it.

Lines.Speaker: Yuu
Lines.Speech: Kt-7! I'm glad you're okay. I was so worried about you after we got split up.
[i]Yuu runs up to hug Kt-7 who gently stops her.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: *Hums in joy* __Yes! Now we have the best person in your unit alongside us. Minus losing against some mushrooms that is.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: No excuse needed Kt-7, we're in hostile territory. I'm just glad you survived. At ease, Soldier.
[i]Kt-7 breaks her salute, then points further into the cave system.

Lines.Speaker: Kt-7
Lines.Speech: We sighted the target down that way, Sir. We were securing the exit route out before attempting to retrieve it. That's when I must have fell victim to the spores; I don't remember much more than that.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Excellent. Lets carry on. Kt-7, you lead up front. Yuu, I want you in the middle, and I'll cover the rear.
